pages.text: Using a Heart of the Sea you can craft Bottomless Buckets, these buckets act differently depending on their contents.
Empty Buckets can consume an infinite amount of liquid, losing it permanently.$(br)Useful to clear out annoying water sources or for nether mining.
Bottomless Water Buckets can place an infinite amount of water, without ever running dry.
Bottomless Milk Buckets come with an endless amount of milk, allowing you to clear harmful effects as often as you wish.
Bottomless Lava Buckets act as an endless source of lava.$(br)Expensive to craft but allowing for infinite fuel and obsidian.
